name: overmedicated
text: I want to be buried in my pyjamas. I want to be comfy.

name: drskradley
text: I want to be buried in the skins of my enemies.

name: socks
text: A comment left by socks was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by missbee, ezcmac, Lolsworth, UntilYouAreSoNude, divot, apocowarg, beansdooma, karljw, symbolsoup, The_Prophet, CatJumpJohn, stanshall, riotdejaneiro, jstegall, Unfun, pwb, StoatLad, glowpaisley, Deusoma, mashisoyo, Gompo, wittyname, goocifer, chochacho, wurlitzergirl, odei, anticitizen, dennycrane, d3lvn, funkingout, clancine, catgrl131, Ebessan, NDCaesar, Conn, dickie_roxx, PurpleRose, woodenteeth, Elliott, Sargasm, atticusonline, Kennisiou, Aaron_Haynes, ih8jonmayr, Vee, CanusDivinus, d3athcann0n, Troy_Convers, luckypyjamas, Pie4me6, cjk98, ZedPower, logic, mountain, TheSoulBear, jefftg7, Cicadalek, empy, gorrioncita, Wite_Rabit, eRiUukFJk, Cowey42, freakywonton, Doc_Rostov, NotCool, perhapsmaybe, holly_golightly, greyfield, stormagnet, Panserbjorne, DeathwishJones, Chachibenji, Dallovich, franklinbluth, aparrish)

name: pwb
text: this is a great guest strip what are you talking about

name: ebessan
text: Sounds like a personal problem to me.

name: saucy_jack
text:
What about the one with Vlad and E-bay!

"Buyer tries to stab me. Signs me up for so much spam"

name: lolsworth
text: Lames: 1293

name: untilyouaresonude
text: Slowwave is so great.

name: centipede_damascus
text: All right, let's do this.

name: gompo
text: I had never seen Slow Wave before this.  Absolutely outstanding idea for a comic, and an amazing strip.

name: cdtm
text: I had no idea Slow Wave was a webcomic!  It's a regular in Connecticuts "New Haven Advocate", a free community paper.

name: philosophe
text: A guy I know from high school is the synth player in a trancefusion band called Slowwwave.

name: closefriend
text: I wonder what Reklaw's real last name is.

name: stuart
text: (Walker?)

name: gormster
text: Why were they burying Ray in a flanno?

name: woodenteeth
text: May be an expensive plaid shirt.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: It was his dad's. Ramses.

name: shoinan
text: Definitely one of the better guest strips. I love how Ray's relatively normal narrative parallels with his wicked sack lingo. That and Phillipe's "shriek" make this is gold.

name: sharksarecoming
text: he doesnt even sign his name.

name: ctrl-s
text: The only guest strip I've ever fived.  For Jesse Reklaw's perfectly realized vision of Ray -- attired in wide-brimmed, feathered pimp hat and ermine-trimmed cape, saying "all right, let's do this," AT HIS OWN FUNERAL -- I can do no less.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: It's a Medieval Goodwill funeral getup.

name: rowboat
text: The first panel is just beautiful. Beyond that...it's alright.

name: rowboat
text:
Seeing it again much later, I realize that it's all good except for the punchline. Whoever this guy is doesn't really understand Ray. It's like he read five or six strips and was, like, "Oh, I get it."

He didn't get it.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Liebot. You put on a tie! They ALL put on ties!

name: dougthehead
text: shriek!

name: charchar
text: Lyle even took off his beater and donned a button-down.  He is givin' Ray some wicked respect.

name: red-barchetta
text: Ray! Don't wear a cape!

name: squares
text: obviously a pimp coat, fool.

name: puguglypress
text: A guest artist who understands Achewood.

name: stubob
text: Ray looks like Bootsy Collins.

name: miku224
text: This one is fun, but the narration doesn't feel like Ray's voice at all.
